Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_0rygi2b8&referenceId=1_0rygi2b8&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Stocktube

Description: Tematica Research's Chris Versace joined Proactive to speak about HANetf and Quickro's November digital infrastructure and connectivity report and the performance of the Digital Infrastructure and Connectivity ETF.Versace highlights how the US's $1 billion infrastructure bill, signed by President Joe Biden into law today, impacts the area, as well as significant M&A activity in the data center space.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3qFoAtX
